SELECT contractId, adStartDate, adEndDate, contractAmount, paymentDate, influencerName, advertiserName, contractStatus, contractLink FROM contract_view
WHERE 1 = 1
AND TRIM(LOWER(contractId)) = REPLACE(TRIM(#{keyword}), '-', '')
AND TRIM(LOWER(influencerName)) LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(LOWER(#{keyword})), '%')
AND TRIM(LOWER(advertiserName)) LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(LOWER(#{keyword})), '%')
-- 기본 검색 없음

SELECT contractId, adStartDate, adEndDate, contractAmount, paymentDate, influencerName, advertiserName, contractStatus, contractLink FROM contract_view
AND TRIM(LOWER(contractId)) = REPLACE(TRIM(#{searchDTO.keyword}), '-', '')
AND TRIM(LOWER(influencerName)) LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(LOWER(#{searchDTO.keyword})), '%')
AND TRIM(LOWER(advertiserName)) LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(LOWER(#{searchDTO.keyword})), '%')
-- 기본 검색 없음
AND contractId > #{cursor}
ORDER BY contractId ASC LIMIT #{size}
